#include<cstdio>
int main()
{
	int T;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	for(int t_i=0;t_i<T;t_i++)
	{
		int N;
		scanf("%d",&N);
		int count_2,count_3,count_5;
		count_2=(N/2)+(N/4)+(N/8)+(N/16)+(N/32)+(N/64)+(N/128)+(N/256)+(N/512);
		count_3=(N/3)+(N/9)+(N/27)+(N/81)+(N/243)+(N/729);
		count_5=(N/5)+(N/25)+(N/125)+(N/625);
		printf("%d\n",count_2);
		printf("%d\n",count_3);
		printf("%d\n",count_5);
	}
}
